short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Followup Reminder for LinkedIn, Gmail, and Messenger

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
FollowUp Reminder is the ultimate Chrome extension that combines a simple to-do list with powerful, timely reminders. Stay organized and never miss an important follow-up again. 

Add tasks effortlessly for Messenger, LinkedIn, Gmail, or any webpage and set reminders for the next 4 hours, today, tomorrow, or a custom date. Receive notifications exactly when you need them, helping you stay focused and productive. 

Your data remains fully private as everything is stored locally on your computer â€“ no sharing, no tracking. FollowUp Reminder is the perfect tool to help you manage tasks, stay on top of your day, and follow up with what matters most. Install now and take control of your time."
